title: WTB: T206 Johnny Evers 'bat on shoulder' Beater
author: oldirtyfishkilla

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Johnny Evers 'bat on shoulder' Beater
posts.post_content:
Shifting my focus slightly and looking for a T206 Johnny Evers 'bat on shoulder' beater/poor card. 

Evers retired to my hometown and opened up a sporting goods store that lasted many years. I'm interested in this card to complete a collection of T206's from the places I've lived.

Let me know what you have and how much. FYI, I don't have a triple-digit budget.

Thanks,
Dan
I'll get with you tomorrow....have what your looking for.

Cubs,  I look forward to it...

Thanks
